data.message:
Bad Lucky

Hey man you see that guy at the bar?
No he is just a bad lie...
so i go at school try a freestyle , and they said
''Please die!!!''
so i go to the park and try to make a pie
but look! they hate
and i cry
...and the girl make a smile
and i can't believe in my eyes

Man , you've got bad lucky
your day it's very spooky
and if you try to escape
you not will change at this way

so at the nexy day , i try to escape
for that bad lucky i have at my way
and i realy fail and come crazy
and i think i'm very lazy
so i get a book and start to read 
i finish and i eat a chesse
so a rat come at my book,
'' i can't believe i'm enough of luck!
i don't have peace with all this tears
i will go to visit my mother because
 i don't want to miss''

Man , you've got bad lucky
your day it's very spooky
and if you try to escape
you not will change at this way

i'm at the house of my mother now 
but i think i will go to fall
and my momma said i have lucky now
because we are together
and we never will come down
but i thing that's strange because i have friends
and stay here now will be our end
so i go to my car and start to drive 
and its rainy 
, i drink a beer when someone called me
''lame''
and next to the school bus , my car slid
and something explodes
and when i looked around , everything burns. ~ Made by me
